title: Playback of file
description: Playback control and actions of log file playback micro service.

timeline_position.title: Timeline position
timeline_position.description: Current frame/row relative time position of total playback interval steps.

duration.title: Duration
duration.description: Total duration in seconds for whole log/recording.

is_playing.title: Playing
is_playing.description: Boolean value if playback is ongoing[true] or paused[false].
